name: Zeus' Prophecy
description:
Zeus' Prophecy is a game made within 64 hours during the Game Jam Mammouth #1. The theme to respect was "Electric Atmosphere". 

In this game, you play as Zeus solo or with a friend to protect your precious treasure from the tiny humans that want to steal it ! 

The battlefield is a giant keyboard that shoots lightning bolt to those stepping where you hit. The player using the mouse just clicks on them. However, some humans are immune to grounded attack, so split your attacks accordingly. 

You may encounter some powerfull enemies near the end of the three waves of enemies.
